name: Team Elimination Games
overview: Become the winner of the Craziest TV show! Take part in more than 25 mini games located in hilarious TV sets and experience a unique 1 vs 3 multiplayer experience. Invite your friends and have fun! Do you have what it takes to be crowned King of the show? More than 25 mini games for the whole family - Instant accessibility and fun for everyone - Fun and easy-to-understand game rules Discover 7 hilarious TV sets: Bathroom, Shopping mall, Versailles palace…. 2 types of gameplay: - Races: it’s free for all! Avoid obstacles and try to get the first place - Challenges: turn by turn each player will need to brave obstacles set by the 3 others. Experience a new multiplayer approach: 1 vs 3 in every game - By switching roles everyone has a chance to win - Extra fun “Sabotage gameplay”: all players gathered vs one single player.
